Network connections initiated by recentl.Action: Monitor Zeek logs (conn.log, http.log) for new connections originating from hosts where recently downloaded files have initiated network activity. Analyze connection patterns with application execution events (if correlating with host data) or look for highly unusual destination IPs/ports using entropy or frequency analysis. Correlate downloads identified in http.log with subsequent outbound connections in conn.log.
